name: InternalRequest
description: Makes a request to the CFML Engine internally.

params.name: template
params.description: Template path (script name) for the request (example:/test/index.cfm).

params.name: urls
params.description: URL scope passed to the request (query string). This can be a struct or a string following this format [name1=value1&name2=value2].

params.name: forms
params.description: FORM scope passed to the request.This can be a struct or a string following this format [name1=value1&name2=value2].

params.name: cookies
params.description: Cookie scope passed to the request

params.name: headers
params.description: Request header entries passed to the request

params.name: body
params.description: body to send with the request

params.name: charset
params.description: charset used for the request, if not set the web charset is used.

params.name: addToken
params.description: if yes add urlToken as cookie

params.name: throwonerror
params.description: if true (default) and the called page throws an exception, that exception is also thrown within the caller request. If false it is catched and only reported in the resulting struct.
